title: Jupyterlab Freeze Extension
description: Settings of the Jupyterlab version of freeze extension.

--jp-freeze-frozen-bg.title: Frozen bg-color
--jp-freeze-frozen-bg.description: The background color of a frozen cell.

--jp-freeze-readonly-bg.title: Readonly bg-color
--jp-freeze-readonly-bg.description: The background color of a locked/readonly cell.
